name: Root Fu Panda
description:
Fight for your life  in a deadly arena setup by machiavellian trees.
Push your opponents into the growing roots to be the last panda alive.

Featuring:

  • Fat pandas fighting for their lives
  • Growing tree roots modifying the arena in real time
  • Magic fruits to make your panda stronger
  • 100% original kazoo music

The team:

  • Christopher Michiels
  • Sylvain Frappez
  • Jules Vannier
  • Macéo Prévost
  • Julien Galibert
  • Grégoire Fontanelli
  • Majoric Hablot
  • Pierre Raffali 
  • With the help of Tristan Le Bozec for SFX

This game was made during the Global Game Jam 2023
